description: This file is the main route component for the notes frontend, defining the main UI, handling state management, and orchestrating interactions with the notes service.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main functional component that sets up state, effects, and renders the notes application.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Runs a task when the component becomes visible; initializes notes service and fetches notes.

methods.name: useTask$
methods.description: Sets up a reactive task to auto-clear toast messages.

methods.name: withService
methods.description: Helper method to obtain the notes service and run a provided async function with it.
